localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A live dashboard of how the COVID-19 vaccine is being administered across the globe.
blogPost.body: A live dashboard of how the COVID-19 vaccine is being administered across the globe.
blogPost.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker - See what’s the progress administering the vaccine globally
blogPost.author: Jonathan Haim Fishner

localize.description: 一个关于冠状病毒疫苗在全球范围内如何接种的实时仪表盘。
localize.tagline: 看看在全球范围内接种疫苗的进展情况

localize.description: 一個關於冠狀病毒疫苗在全球範圍內如何接種的實時儀表盤。
localize.tagline: 看看在全球範圍內接種疫苗的進展情況

previous.excerpt: Push a button and send user stories in your product spec to Jira. Fable will also keep the spec fresh with any changes made to the tickets on Jira. No more copy + pasting from Docs into Jira, no more stale spec!
previous.title: Fable - Sync user stories and requirements between Docs and Jira

localize.description: 按下按钮，将产品规格中的用户故事发送到Jira上。Fable还将通过对Jira上的票据所做的任何更改来保持规格的新鲜感。不再需要从Docs复制+粘贴到Jira中，不再有陈旧的规格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之间同步用户故事和需求。

localize.description: 按下按鈕，將產品規格中的用戶故事發送到Jira上。Fable還將通過對Jira上的票據所做的任何更改來保持規格的新鮮感。不再需要從Docs複製+粘貼到Jira中，不再有陳舊的規格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之間同步用戶故事和需求。

next.excerpt: The Koan Free tier is a great first step in the journey, making it easy for teams to discover a more transparent, collaborative way of working. Teams in the habit of sharing status, recognizing wins, and heading off concerns early will naturally raise the bar for everyone else around them.
next.title: Koan Free Tier - Work with purpose using our OKR and status tracking platform

localize.description: Koan免费层是这个旅程中的第一步，让团队很容易发现一种更透明、更协作的工作方式。习惯于分享状态、认可胜利和尽早解决疑虑的团队，自然会提高周围其他人的标准。
localize.tagline: 使用我们的OKR和状态跟踪平台，有目的的工作。

localize.description: Koan免費層是這個旅程中的第一步，讓團隊很容易發現一種更透明、更協作的工作方式。習慣於分享狀態、認可勝利和儘早解決疑慮的團隊，自然會提高周圍其他人的標準。
localize.tagline: 使用我們的OKR和狀態跟蹤平臺，有目的的工作。
